title: Mini-Ep 158: Aquaphor and Cozy Socks
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 158: Aquaphor and Cozy Socks
itunes:subtitle: Kate gets back on the horse (literally!) and Doree has the holiday blues. Then, listeners give their suggestions for teacher gifts, an expert calls in with a skincare tip for Doree, and they hear great self-care tips from a new listener!Activity of ...
description:
Kate gets back on the horse (literally!) and Doree has the holiday blues. Then, listeners give their suggestions for teacher gifts, an expert calls in with a skincare tip for Doree, and they hear great self-care tips from a new listener!


Activity of the Week: As our friend Jackie Johnson of Natch Beaut says: Cream your feet!


To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.

Follow us on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums).


This week’s episode is sponsored by:

ULTA BEAUTY - See the joy this holiday season! Shop in store, curbside pickup or online at ulta.com.

CONAIR - Try the Turbo Extreme Steam Handheld Steamer!To buy go to conair.com and search Turbo Extreme Steam.

FIGS - For 15% off your first purchase from FIGS, go to wearfigs.com and enter promo code FOREVER at checkout. 

BETTER HELP - Get 10% off your first month with the discount code FOREVER35. Go to betterhelp.com/FOREVER35 to get started today.

RITUAL - For 10% off during your first three months visit ritual.com/FOREVER35. 

HAWTHORNE - Find the perfect gift this holiday season by visiting Hawthorne.CO/GIFT!


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
